original_text: But it was so, that in the three and twentieth year of king Jehoash the priests had not repaired the breaches of the house.
korean_text: 요아스 왕 제이십삼년에 이르도록 제사장들이 성전의 파손한 데를 수리하지 아니하였는지라

sentences.original_text: that in the three and twentieth year of king Jehoash
the priests had not repaired the breaches
